description: Aaron Collins fires Bolton back into the League One play-off places with the only goal in a win over former club Bristol Rovers.
title: Bolton Wanderers 1-0 Bristol Rovers
title_page: Bolton Wanderers 1-0 Bristol Rovers - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bolton Wanderers have won just one of their last nine home league games against Bristol Rovers since February 1984 (D5 L3), a 1-0 victory in September 1989.
After winning the reverse fixture 3-2 in March, Bristol Rovers will be looking to complete a first league double over Bolton Wanderers since the 1985-86 season.
Bolton have won four of their last five home league games (L1), though did lose their last outing on home soil 1-0 to Stockport County.
